title: Fantasy Ambiences
description: Fantasy Ambiences offers a complete solution for your fantasy game project.
longDescription:
FREE SAMPLES of this pack here

AUDIO TRAILER HERE


Fantasy Ambiences offers a complete solution for your fantasy game, video, or movie. In the sound pack, you will find ambience loops for common ambience environments including grasslands, forests, winter, deserts, water, lava, rain, jungles, camps, outposts, caverns, caves, ruins, underworlds, and many more.

 

Each loop is at least 1 minute in length (except for 3) and is offered with all its component stems. That means, if you don’t want that bird sound, you can remove it. Don’t want wind, remove it. Don’t want insects, remove them too. The choice is yours. You can combine elements together to create your own ambience sounds custom to your project and your needs.

 

All sounds in the Fantasy Ambiences Loop sound pack are drag-and-drop ready for your project. Every audio file is UCS compatible and can be easily searched and found as they are meticulously organized into categories.

 

Discover

  • 130+ ambience loops that you can import directly into your project
  • Grasslands, forests, winter, deserts, water, lava, rain, jungles, camps, outposts, caverns, caves, ruins, underworlds, and more ambiences
  • Individual stems so you can mix and match sounds to your liking
  • Over 17GB of HQ audio content (at 48khz 24bit)
  • Super HQ audio recorded and designed at 192k 32bit and delivered at 48k 24bit
  • Easily and quickly find sounds with richly embedded metadata (Soundminer, Basehead, Soundly, UCS, BWF)


Included in this pack: 

Apothecary (3 ambiences, 20 files)

Bonus Content (130 files)

Camps and Outposts (3 ambiences, 17 files)

Caves (8 ambiences, 19 files)

Cemetery (6 ambiences, 25 files)

Desert (32 ambiences, 42 files)

Designed (100 files)

Fireplaces (6 ambiences, 37 files)

Forests (12 ambiences, 72 files)

Grasslands and Meadows (10 ambiences, 34 files)

Harbors and Docks (4 ambiences, 33 files)

Jungle (5 ambiences, 49 files)

Lava (4 ambiences, 17 files)

Rain (10 ambiences, 10 files)

Rivers and Creeks (12 ambiences, 12 files)

Subtle Tones (7 ambiences, 7 files)

Swamps (6 ambiences, 33 files)

Tar, Mud, and Goo (2 ambiences, 14 files)

Underwater Worlds (6 ambiences, 17 files)

Winter (3 ambiences, 3 files)
technicalDetails:

Total Minutes of Audio: 4hr 43min 56sec

Sample Rate & Bit Depth: 48kHz & 24bit

File Type: WAV

Format: Stereo

Metadata: Soundminer, Basehead, Soundly, UCS, BWF

Do Sound FX Loop?: YES
